title: Gemma Collins looks unrecognisable as she shows off weight loss
text:
She's been on a mission to lose weight this year and has used £250 SkinnyJabs to help her shed an impressive three stone.

And Gemma Collins' showed off the results of her determination as she shared a snap of her looking slimmer than ever on Instagram.

The TOWIE star, 38, looked incredible as she wore a sparkly multi-coloured turban-inspired hat over her blonde tresses while enjoying a night out with pals in Dubai.

Changes: Gemma Collins, 38, looked unrecognisable as she showed off her efforts to lose weight in a recent Instagram snap taken while she was on a trip to Dubai

Gemma's face looked noticeably slimmer as she smiled directly at the camera and appeared to be wearing less makeup that usual, opting for a lighter blush.

The TV star completed her glam look for the dinner with friends by wearing a satin green top over a lacy black ensemble.

In another picture shared on social media the GC was seen standing at the top of a table next to Billie Faiers' partner Greg Shepherd with her arms out.

Weight loss: The TV star, pictured at the Deliveroo Awards on October 18, has already shed three stone and recently revealed she would like to lose another three by Christmas

Gemma look completely contrasted her appearance in recent weeks, when she's stepped out at events including The Deliveroo Awards and her own perfume launch.

Although she has lost an impressive amount of weight, some fans have suggested that Gemma has been editing her pictures to make herself look thinner.

Last Thursday some questioned whether the star had posted a Photoshopped image of her wearing an animal print two-piece as they said the floor and skirting boards were 'wonky'.

Group pic: Greg Shepherd shared a snap from the evening in Dubai with Gemma stood at the head of the table smiling as she held her arms out. He captioned the picture 'Dubz!'

Girls trip: The GC, third right, has shared several glimpses into her Dubai holiday with pals including fellow TOWIE star Billie, 29, second right, who was sporting a sparkly red skirt

One person wrote: 'I applaud you on your weight loss but photoshopping not only deceives others but ultimately yourself ..

'Skirting board is wonky behind legs and shadow doesn't look right, am I the only one seeing this?'

Others said it was 'obvious Gemma is deceiving her fans by airbrushing her pictures' and another said 'weight loss of filter'.

However stylish Lucas Armitage, who said he took the picture and did the edit, said that he had not changed Gemma's shape in the picture.

Edited? Last week fans claimed Gemma had Photoshopped her Instagram post, with them suggesting the skirting board behind her legs was 'wonky'

Gemma has previously spoken about her weight loss using Skinnyjabs, saying: 'I want to lose another three (stone) between now and Christmas. I don't want to be stick thin, I just want to be a lot healthier.'

This came after the reality star spoke of her plans to have a breast reduction.

'I'd be really happy if I lost six stone as that would bring me down to 12 stone and a size 16,' Gemma told The Sun. 'My boobs are so big and I want to get them reduced in January, but I have to lose three stone before they can operate.'

To lose the weight, Gemma said she would undergo the injections again, explaining: 'Last time I had them, I didn't eat for four days. Literally nothing.

Changes: Gemma, pictured at the launch of her perfume Diva Pink on October 21, has used £250 SkinnyJabs in the past, which she said were 'fantastic and really works for me'

'I just didn't have an appetite. You just don't think about food or being hungry. It's fantastic and really works for me.'

Of her breast size, Gemma added: 'My boobs are 38GG now and I think I will go down to a C or a D-cup. The operation is all booked in.

'I think when you have big boobs, they can make you look bigger and I would just love to never ever wear a bra again.'

It comes after Gemma previously revealed that she only eats two meals a day and that she 'doesn't know why she is overweight'.

However the TV personality recently revealed she hasn't stopped eating since she reportedly called 999 over fears her on-off boyfriend James Argent had overdosed.

The star admitted she was feeling stressed but vowed to bounce back and return to the gym.

Gemma told The Sun: 'I ain’t stopped eating. I’ve had a lot of stress and I’ve not been to the gym in two weeks, I’ve been unwell all weekend with a chest infection.

'When I come back, I will get back on it, I always come out on top. 'My life always goes a bit t*ts-up but I carry on, I’ve got lots of projects on the table, so it’s exciting.'
description: Gemma Collins, 38, showed off the results of her determination to lose weight in a snap of her looking thinner than ever while wearing a colourful turban during a trip to Dubai.
